snippet: Apple’s MobileMe service is scheduled to end on June 30. Here are possible replacements for its photo/video galleries, Web page building tools and online hard drives.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column points out that, with the advent of iCloud, Apple’s MobileMe service is scheduled to end on June 30; suggests possible replacements for its photo/video galleries, Web page building tools and online hard drives.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s MobileMe service is scheduled to end on June 30. Here are possible replacements for its photo/video galleries, Web page building tools and online hard drives.

headline.seo: Goodbye, MobileMe. Hello, SmugMug, Dropbox and Jimdo. — State of the Art
